problem_text_cn: 如图,等边三角形ABC的边长为4,点P为BC边上一点,且BP=1,点D为AC边上一点．若∠APD=60°,则CD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the edge length of equilateral triangle ABC is N_0, point P is a point on the side of BC, and BP = N_1, point D is a point on the side of AC. If ∠APD = N_2, the length of CD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴AB=BC=AC=4,∠B=∠C=60°,∴∠BAP+∠APB=180°-60°=120°,∵∠APD=60°,∴∠APB+∠DPC=180°-60°=120°,∴∠BAP=∠DPC,即∠B=∠C,∠BAP=∠DPC,∴△BAP∽△CPD,∴\frac{AB}{CP}=\frac{BP}{CD},∵AB=BC=4,CP=BC-BP=4-1=3,BP=1,即\frac{4}{4-1}=\frac{1}{CD},解得:CD=\frac{3}{4},故选:C．
